name: Bloid invaders
description:
A multiplayer Spaceship Shooter with Xbox 360 controller support!

Features

  • Destructible ground
  • 2 Players
  • Xbox 360 Controller compatibility
Controls:

Player One:
Ctrl - Shoot
Arrows- Move

Player Two:
Space - Shoot
A/D - Move

Started: 11 December 2016
Released: 25 Febuary 2017
